sect1.title: Character Sets
sect1.para: Zend_Mail does not check for the correct character set of the mail parts. When instantiating Zend_Mail, a charset for the e-mail itself may be given. It defaults to iso-8859-1. The application has to make sure that all parts added to that mail object have their content encoded in the correct character set. When creating a new mail part, a different charset can be given for each part.

note.title: Only in text format
note.para: Character sets are only applicable for message parts in text format.
